overview:
Allyson Pizula is currently part of the founding team and leading user acquisition and marketing at Lifecrowd.

Prior to launching Lifecrowd, she helped to create a video syndication strategy at Joost following the acquisition of the property by Adconion Media Group. Allyson was additionally an integral part of the marketing and content team at MySpace. There she was responsible for seeking sports-related opportunities that aligned audience interests and increased user engagement. Allyson developed and executed a range of revenue generating programs and established a number of strategic partnerships with major sports properties.

Allyson holds a BS in Business Administration from the University of Southern California with an emphasis in Marketing.
